thread.title: Attend Wofford College Homecoming and Stay at Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85

author: cbs8
title: Attend Wofford College Homecoming and Stay at Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
text:
Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers affordable lodging for Wofford College Homecoming Weekend on October 23-24, 2015.
 SPARTANBURG, SC, October 17, The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 offers affordable lodging for Wofford College Homecoming Weekend on October 23-24. Weekend festivities include a street party, class reunions, tailgating, and the Terrier Ball. The Homecoming game will feature Wofford and U.T. Chattanooga. Kickoff time is 1:30pm at Gibbs Stadium. Game tickets are $27 for adults and $15 for children.
"We look forward to welcoming alumni and fans for Homecoming Weekend," shares Dawn Allison, General Manager at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85. "Our award winning property is convenient to Wofford College and downtown Spartanburg," continues Ms. Allison.
This Spartanburg South Carolina hotel offers spacious, non-smoking guest rooms with free high speed Internet and Clean & Fresh Hampton Beds . Whirlpool tubs are available in some rooms. Travelers will appreciate the convenience of an in-room microwave, mini refrigerator, and coffee maker. The complimentary On the House Breakfast awaits guests each morning in the lobby. Those with limited time can take an On the Run Breakfast Bag with them on weekdays. Hotel amenities include a seasonal outdoor pool, fitness room, 24-hour business center, and guest laundry. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85 received the 2015 TripAdvisor Certificate of Excellence for outstanding service.
This Spartanburg SC hotel is located off I-85 at Exit 78. Nearby Upstate attractions include Croft State Park, Carolina Foothills Artisan Center, and the Premium Outlets at Gaffney. Current hotel specials include the Weekend Getaway Package, with late check out, and discounts for AAA members and seniors. HHonors members can earn points toward free nights.
 about Wofford College Homecoming Weekend activities, visit www.wofford.edu/homecoming/ . To book your stay at the Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85, call (864) 577-9080 or visit online at www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com .
About Hampton Inn Spartanburg North I-85
This Spartanburg Hotel invites guests to step back in time to the colonial era or indulge in modern luxuries and recreation in Spartanburg, South Carolina. The Hampton Inn Spartanburg Hotel on North I-85 is situated to offer easy access of the Duncan business centers and is within five minutes of Wofford College. Guests can take a short drive into Greenville to see historic landmarks or enjoy world-class entertainment. This Spartanburg hotel offers a full range of services and amenities to make your stay exceptional.
 visit http://www.HamptonInnSpartanburg.com
